Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for depth of field assignments.

NameEntry.Name: Depth of Field: Depths / Undead Burg / Undead Parish
Depth of Field: Darkroot Garden / Oolacile
Depth of Field: Catacombs / Tomb of the Giants / Great Hollow
Depth of Field: Blighttown / Demon Ruins / Lost Izalith
Depth of Field: New Londo Ruins / Valley of Drakes
Depth of Field: Kiln of the First Flame / Northern Undead Asylum

farDofBegin.Wiki: The distance at which distant objects start to become blurred due to depth of field. In metres.

farDofEnd.Wiki: The distance at which distant objects become completely blurred due to depth of field. In metres.

farDofMul.Wiki: The strength of the depth of field blur. 0 means no blur.

nearDofBegin.Wiki: The distance at which distant objects start to become blurred due to depth of field. In metres.

nearDofEnd.Wiki: The distance at which distant objects become completely blurred due to depth of field. In metres.

nearDofMul.Wiki: The strength of the depth of field blur. 0 means no blur.

dispersionSq.Wiki: The base strength of the depth of field blur.
